wikipediaPreview: Love Australia or Leave is an Australian political party registered for federal elections since October 2016.[1] The party platform includes opposition to immigration and Islam in Australia, and support of Australia leaving the United Nations. It was founded in 2016 by Kim Vuga who had appeared in a television documentary in 2015 called Go Back to Where You Came From which sought to expose ordinary Australians to the situations faced by refugees and asylum seekers.[2] The party was registered in October 2016...
